oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Compact broadband rectangular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: compact microstrip antenna
broadband microstrip antenna
c-shaped
shorted l-shaped
w-shaped
square-ring microstrip antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Compact and broadband gap-coupled microstrip antennas using modified variations of the rectangular microstrip antenna (MSA), namely, C-shaped, shorted L-shaped, W-shaped, and square-ring MSAs. are proposed. These antennas have large bandwidth with a reduced total patch size. (c) 2006 .
